009package Ch17_EdgePreserving_Smoothing;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.NagaoMatsuyamaF.Parameters;
017import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.NagaoMatsuyamaFilterScalar;
018import imagingbook.common.filter.edgepreserving.NagaoMatsuyamaFilterVector;
019import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
020import imagingbook.core.plugin.JavaDocHelp;
021import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
022
023import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
024
025/**
026 * <p>
027 * This plugin demonstrates the 5x5 Nagao-Matsuyama filter, as described in [1]]. See Sec. 17.1 of [2] for additional
028 * details.This plugin works for all types of images and stacks.
029 * <p>
030 * [1] M. Nagao and T. Matsuyama. Edge preserving smoothing. Computer Graphics and Image Processing 9(4), 394â€“407
031 * (1979).
032 * <br>
033 * [2] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
034 * (2022).
035 * </p>
036 *
037 * @author WB
038 * @version 2022/12/12
039 * @see NagaoMatsuyamaFilterScalar
040 * @see NagaoMatsuyamaFilterVector
041 */
042public class Nagao_Matsuyama_Filter implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
043        
044        private static Parameters params = new Parameters();
045        private static boolean UseVectorFilter = false;
046        private boolean isColor;
047
048        /**
049         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
050         */
051        public Nagao_Matsuyama_Filter() {
052                if (noCurrentImage()) {
053                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Postcard2c);
054                }
055        }
056
057        @Override
058        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
059                        return DOES_ALL;
060        }
061
062        @Override
063    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
064        isColor = (ip instanceof ColorProcessor);
065                if (!runDialog())
066                        return;
067                if (isColor && UseVectorFilter) {
068                        new NagaoMatsuyamaFilterVector(params).applyTo((ColorProcessor)ip);
069                }
070                else {
071                        new NagaoMatsuyamaFilterScalar(params).applyTo(ip);
072                }
073    }
074    
075    private boolean runDialog() {
076                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
077                gd.addNumericField("Variance threshold", params.varThreshold, 0);
078                if (isColor)
079                        gd.addCheckbox("Use vector filter", UseVectorFilter);
080
081                gd.showDialog();
082                if (gd.wasCanceled())
083                        return false;
084
085                params.varThreshold = Math.max(gd.getNextNumber(),0);
086                if (isColor)
087                        UseVectorFilter = gd.getNextBoolean();
088                return true;
089    }
090    
091}
092
